item.title: CVE-2024-43351|2024-08-18T13:10:04.880Z -- cryoutcreations -- bravada
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CryoutCreations Bravada bravada allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bravada: from n/a through 1.1.2.
